sentences.sContent: The south declivity of Yimeng Uplift and the slope places around Central Uplift are the important areas for surveying gas reservoirs in regional stratigraphic traps.
sentences.sContent_eng: The south declivity of Yimeng Uplift and the slope places around Central Uplift are the important areas for surveying gas reservoirs in regional stratigraphic traps.
sentences.sCn: 伊盟隆起南坡、中央古隆起的围斜部位是寻找区域地层圈闭气藏的重要地区；

trans.tranOther: a downward slope, esp of the ground
